body: Hi Anton, Thanks for the suggestion link, it really helpful.  however, I still can't get rid of warning the non-convex surface from E+ Run Energy Simulation.  Yes now I can still read simulation result, yet warning seem disturbing me. As I continue my exercise to daylighting simulation it gave me error as follow:  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/gnh1ndzD4NxkHGfQy8YapcjLC3Y4-Z3sE2601tQUdcphpjKlPr4PXhWVHLR4tYoidG83p9Q-JDPXhldMj5czel5o2y2l*jXo/daylighterror.png) As I continue further for Indoor View Factor Calculator it gave me Null result and warning as follow: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/gnh1ndzD4NxJCfH3Sb-j52wn3lCN3rZy8G3Q*5G7lisHoDygz4wi1LeGSd2O-ys0BAWJsfD60BoVAvJv9l4ZuY0j1N68M74U/indoorviewfactorcalclatorerror.png) Do you have any further suggestion how I could solve the problems?  Also please find an attachment of my update energy model. Atta
